channel.title: Comments on: This Could Be A Vanguard Fan Site

item.title: By: Ragewind
item.dc:creator: Ragewind
item.description: Oh, I forgot to mention that when I called up Sony's tech support to see what was going on, and to see if they supported dual core or SLI/Quad SLI (at the time I didn't know) the techs solution to my problem was to buy a new video card that didn't have SLI and maybe the game would run better. All I said to him was "are you guys going to buy me a new video card because Sigil programmers are morons?" and hung up on him.
item.content:encoded: Oh, I forgot to mention that when I called up Sony’s tech support to see what was going on, and to see if they supported dual core or SLI/Quad SLI (at the time I didn’t know) the techs solution to my problem was to buy a new video card that didn’t have SLI and maybe the game would run better. All I said to him was “are you guys going to buy me a new video card because Sigil programmers are morons?” and hung up on him.

item.title: By: Ragewind
item.dc:creator: Ragewind
item.description:
I still can't believe the the retard programmers at Sigil Games didn't think to put dual core support and SLI / Quad SLI support for a game that takes that much processing power for both CPU and GPU.
It's utterly sad that my AMD FX-62 with 2GB of Mushkin DDR2 and Quad SLI XFX Geforce 7950 GX2 can't make Vancrap run without PC lag.
item.content:encoded:
I still can’t believe the the retard programmers at Sigil Games didn’t think to put dual core support and SLI / Quad SLI support for a game that takes that much processing power for both CPU and GPU.

It’s utterly sad that my AMD FX-62 with 2GB of Mushkin DDR2 and Quad SLI XFX Geforce 7950 GX2 can’t make Vancrap run without PC lag.

item.title: By: Razik
item.dc:creator: Razik
item.description: My rig is an 6600 on a 680i with 2 gig of ram, 8800 gtx...runs like shit.
item.content:encoded: My rig is an 6600 on a 680i with 2 gig of ram, 8800 gtx…runs like shit.

item.title: By: Kelvar
item.dc:creator: Kelvar
item.description: Sadly, Vantard (bwa ha!) does not support SLI at this time, so those of you griping about poor performance with your leet SLI set up are really only using one card - hence the poor performance. APparently full suport for dual core, SLI and Vista will be added early in release. Even more sadly, I am one of those people with a SLI set up, my second card neglected. A*sigh*
item.content:encoded: Sadly, Vantard (bwa ha!) does not support SLI at this time, so those of you griping about poor performance with your leet SLI set up are really only using one card – hence the poor performance. APparently full suport for dual core, SLI and Vista will be added early in release. Even more sadly, I am one of those people with a SLI set up, my second card neglected. A*sigh*

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Man, your main blog picture is Honor Hold now.
Thrallmar will win the eternal battle over the ditch full of orcs. Just you wait!
item.content:encoded:
Man, your main blog picture is Honor Hold now.

Thrallmar will win the eternal battle over the ditch full of orcs. Just you wait!

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.description: uh huh =) I've built hundreds of machines, but the fact is no matter what machine I play it on it just runs horribly (I've personally got 3 different machines as well as the 'ol ball and chains machine).
item.content:encoded: uh huh =) I’ve built hundreds of machines, but the fact is no matter what machine I play it on it just runs horribly (I’ve personally got 3 different machines as well as the ‘ol ball and chains machine).

item.title: By: blachawk
item.dc:creator: blachawk
item.description: Gheist, you sound like you know what you're doing, but I'll ask it anyway. You do know that higher clock speeds do not always yield increased performance?
item.content:encoded: Gheist, you sound like you know what you’re doing, but I’ll ask it anyway. You do know that higher clock speeds do not always yield increased performance?

item.title: By: Gheist
item.dc:creator: Gheist
item.description:
liquid cooled dual core 4800 overclocked to 6000 with twin 7800's (yer I know so ... 2006 :P) overclocked by 20% each, 2gig of memory, 100 gig 10k rpm drives x 2 and still ... Vanguard runs like a bag of shit. I zone (yer it's supposed to be seamless ... my arse) it takes 2 mins of pure lock up while I load the next part of the world. I run on medium settings with the distance pulled right down just to get an acceptable frame rate.
After all that it looks cack, EQ2 full settings (minus a few shadows) will run flawlessly, I wont even mention what frame rate I get from all the latest games because it's not an issues, but it is with vanguard.
item.content:encoded:
liquid cooled dual core 4800 overclocked to 6000 with twin 7800’s (yer I know so … 2006 :P) overclocked by 20% each, 2gig of memory, 100 gig 10k rpm drives x 2 and still … Vanguard runs like a bag of shit. I zone (yer it’s supposed to be seamless … my arse) it takes 2 mins of pure lock up while I load the next part of the world. I run on medium settings with the distance pulled right down just to get an acceptable frame rate.

After all that it looks cack, EQ2 full settings (minus a few shadows) will run flawlessly, I wont even mention what frame rate I get from all the latest games because it’s not an issues, but it is with vanguard.

item.title: By: Cyndre
item.dc:creator: Cyndre
item.description:
LOL, I made an entire post on my blog a few weeks ago, based on a <a href="http://cyndre.blogspot.com/2007/01/i-am-vanguarded.html" rel="nofollow">Vanguard pun</a>. What about the title makes it so easy to do that?
In my post I Vandalize the quality of play... oh zing!
item.content:encoded:
LOL, I made an entire post on my blog a few weeks ago, based on a Vanguard pun. What about the title makes it so easy to do that?

In my post I Vandalize the quality of play… oh zing!

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: If you send me a 8800gtx, I'll take you up on your offer. A fair trade! Maybe force Vanhemlock to play and write about it, by gunpoint? It could work.
item.content:encoded: If you send me a 8800gtx, I’ll take you up on your offer. A fair trade! Maybe force Vanhemlock to play and write about it, by gunpoint? It could work.
